description: Try our easy to follow Honey Soy & Sesame Broccolini recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Honey Soy & Sesame Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip sesame seeds into a cold wok and heat over high heat, stirring until sesame seeds are golden. Transfer to a plate.
Reheat wok over a high heat until very hot. Add oil and swirl to coat the wok. Add the Broccolini® and stir-fry for 1 minute. Add 2 teaspoon water, cover and cook for 30 seconds until bright green.
Combine soy, honey and sesame oil, pour over the Broccolini® and stir-fry for 1 minute until hot. Scatter over the sesame seeds and serve.
